shortdesc.ph: The interface is used by the SDK to send CDN streaming event notifications to the app. The app receives SDK event notifications by inheriting methods from this interface.
The interface class is used by the SDK to send CDN streaming event notifications to the App. The App obtains SDK event notifications by inheriting methods of this interface class.
interface class is used by the SDK to send CDN streaming event notifications to the app. The app receives SDK event notifications by inheriting methods of this interface.
The interface class is used by the SDK to send CDN streaming event notifications to the App. The App receives the SDK's event notifications by inheriting methods of this interface class.
